front.title: ERP extensions for the ABFAB architecture

abstract.t: The Application Bridging for Federated Access Beyond Web (ABFAB) architecture [I-D.ietf-abfab-arch] allows the use of EAP to perform access control to a wide range of applications. This document describes the extensions required to incorporate support for the EAP Extensions for the EAP Re-authentication Protocol (ERP) to this architecture, in order to provide an enhanced fast re-authentication and Single Sign-On (SSO) support and a better resource utilization. Authorization aspects are also described.
